content: According to the agenda <http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Agenda_201701_WGM#Mon_Q4>, there are two workflow discussions happening today Q4. What's the difference between the one in Rio Grande Center and the one in Chula Vista Boardroom?
Michael, the one in Chula Vista is really a PHER meeting, discussing progress on STU3 - including aligning PHER's resources to the workflow patterns. So, not really about workflow per se.
anyone have a sample implementation of FHIR Workflow resources on top of a Rules Engine or BPM ?
